name: The Illuminati
description:
"Illuminates" is a puzzle video game for one player.

What is the game about?

The countries organized a secret alliance and decided to build a base on the Moon. We are the evil Illuminates who are trying to embroil countries that have unscrupulously invaded our territory and interfere with our peaceful lives.

How to play?
— Solve different puzzles
— Сhange the direction of the conveyors
— Don't let the boxes fall
— Speed up the conveyors if it’s necessary
— Send postal packets with compromising information to all countries
— Break up all the countries
— Don't let the countries finish building the base
